page.title: 17Tourism. 0440014
page.content: Visitors often come to Lparish and H.Priors to see the {churches}and{old {thatched cottages.}Trout fishermen come to the Test.Many tourists take refreshments at The Plough,The Cricketers or the Hurstbourne. Sometimes we see artists painting in both villages. Every Tuesday at 10a.m.throughout the year one or two {coach parties of { Scandinavian tourists}visit Lparish. Coffee is served at The Plough and then the people walk 300m to{St {Nicholas Church. } A Swedish gentleman we interviewed told us the party had flown to London the previous day and had stopped at Lparish (en route for Stonehenge).He said he particularly liked the thatched cottages and the countryside. Other members of the party said they enjoyed the tranquillity and beauty.
